FuncDef: The reset twamp-light statistics command clears TWAMP Light session statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears all TWAMP Light session statistics.
-

Clears the statistics of a specified TWAMP Light session.
For the X3 device, the value is an integer ranging from 1 to 3072.For the X8/X16 device, the value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8192.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If existing TWAMP Light session statistics are useless and TWAMP Light session statistics need to be re-collected, run the reset twamp-light statistics command to clear the existing session statistics.
TWAMP Light session statistics cannot be restored after being cleared. Run this command with caution.
